name: CALL FOR PAPERS: Elections in a Democratic Rule of Law State During a Pandemic Sanitary Regime as a Challenge for Public Policy (January 6, 2021)
content: The scientific journal “Public Policy Studies” (http://szpp.sgh.waw.pl) published at the Collegium of Socio-Economics of the SGH Warsaw School of Economics, announces the Call for Papers for the Special Issue on social problems related to elections during the COVID-19 pandemic: Elections in a Democratic Rule of Law State During a Pandemic Sanitary Regime as a Challenge for Public Policy Deadline for submitting proposals/abstracts of papers: January 6, 2021\. Deadline for submitting manuscripts: July 15, 2021.
